headline.main: 50 PUT TO DEATH FOR ZAGREB BLAST; Convicted of 'Instigating' the Phone Exchange Bombing -- 3 Executed in France

lead_paragraph: ROME, Sept 23 -- The German controlled Croat Government has executed fifty men described as "Communists and Jews" as "intellectual instigators" of the recent bomb explosions in the Zagreb central telephone exchange, in which a German major, twelve German soldiers and several Croats were wounded, according to dispatches from Zagreb printed in the Italian press today.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
